name: Last Words Of Wisteria (TTRPG)
description:
Last Words of Wisteria is a solo-journaling TTRPG where you play a god of death whose purpose is to listen to the life story of the souls that pass into your care before seeing them to their proper afterlife. This game is a two page RPG about considering the meaning that others made out of their lives, their hopes and their regrets, and to write about whatever thoughts these may bring up. 

To play you'll need a standard deck of 52 playing cards, and either a pen and paper or other method of keeping a journal.
